First we create a classification model to get an encoder that know how to classify defects pixels. Then, we build a UNet from the trained encoder and train a segmentation model.

{% raw %} 
models_dir = path / "models"
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
models_dir.ls()
{% endraw %}

Classification

{% raw %} 
class_metrics = [accuracy_multi, PrecisionMulti(), RecallMulti()]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_classifier_learner[source]

get_classifier_learner(bs:int, arch=resnet18, metrics=[<function accuracy_multi at 0x7f9c08d28ca0>, <fastai.metrics.AccumMetric object at 0x7f9c035bb1c0>, <fastai.metrics.AccumMetric object at 0x7f9c035bb250>], toload:str=None)

Get a classification Learner

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
bs = 4
class_learner = get_classifier_learner(bs)
{% endraw %}

Segmentation

{% raw %} 
seg_metrics = [DiceMulti(), dice_kaggle]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
bs = 4 
szs = (128, 800)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_segmentation_learner[source]

get_segmentation_learner(bs:int, szs, arch=resnet18, metrics=[<fastai.metrics.DiceMulti object at 0x7f9c035bb190>, <function dice_kaggle at 0x7f9bedfb5d30>], toload:str=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
seg_learn = get_segmentation_learner(bs, szs)
{% endraw %}
